name: TOUCHLESS
description:
People say   forbidden fruit  tastes sweetest but can have a bad aftertaste or in this case steam.

We all  know it is easier to be with someone you can’t love then to admit you are still in love with someone you can’t have. Join Icesis the princess of the Icenton and her quest through the kingdom of Inferno. Help Icesis get to her lover Aslan, king of Inferno by collecting the pieces of an ancient shield  in his kingdom that will  grant her one wish. Defeat the creatures of inferno and the woman who wants  the king  for herself. Will the princess of Iceton get to her lover in time to make her wish come true or melt trying to feel the warm touch of her king.
